name: Atthikadai Jummah Masjid
description: Atthikadai Jummah Masjid, situated in Kanyakumari district, is a respected Islamic center known for its role in community worship and cultural activities. It serves as a gathering place for Friday Jummah prayers, offering spiritual guidance and fostering unity among worshippers through religious education and social initiatives. The masjid plays a crucial role in preserving Islamic traditions and promoting communal harmony, serving as a spiritual anchor for the local Muslim community.
